sentences.sentence: I have no constipations any more and my file also disappears.
sentences.translation: 我不再便秘了，痔疮也消了。

sentences.sentence: Results: The article has completely and systematically summed up constipations etiological factor, pathogenesis, vulgar symptom and clinical manifestation.
sentences.translation: 结果：全面、系统总结出便秘从肝辨证的理论依据，病因病机，常见证候，临床表现及其治疗方法。
